QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when sse_description ->> 'Status' = 'ENABLED' then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when sse_description ->> 'Status' = 'ENABLED' then title || ' encryption at rest enabled.'
    else title || ' encryption at rest not enabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_dax_cluster;
